ResourceHeader.Description: This data set contains EISCAT common program CP6 auto-correlation functions (ACF) from the Tromso VHF Radar.

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Antenna Azimuth
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Single Value Parameters - Values: Antenna Azimuth (0, North)

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Antenna Elevation
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Single Value Parameters - Values: Antenna Elevation (90, Vertical)

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Half Scattering Angle
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Single Value Parameters - Values: Half Scattering Angle (0, 90째)

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Transmit Peak Power
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Single Value Parameters - Values: Transmit Peak Power

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Number of Sample Summed
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Single Value Parameters - Values: Number of Sample Summed

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Number of Sample Summed - Increment
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Single Value Parameters - Values: Number of Sample Summed - Increment

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar System Temperature
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Single Value Parameters - Values: System Temperature

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Line Of Sight Velocity
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Primary Parameter Line Of Sight Velocity (for monostatic radar) or velocity along the Transmit/Receive direction bisector

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Line Of Sight Velocity Error
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Primary Parameter Line Of Sight Velocity Error

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Doppler Frequency Measured
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Primary Parameter Doppler Frequency Measured

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Decimal Logarithm of the Raw Electron Densities
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Primary Parameter Decimal Logarithm of the Raw Electron Densities
Parameter.Caveats: The Logaritm is applied on the scaled valued. Scale : 1.e^-3

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Decimal Logarithm of the Electron Densities
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Primary Parameter Decimal Logarithm of the Electron Densities
Parameter.Caveats: The Logaritm is applied on the scaled valued. Scale : 1.e^-3

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Decimal Logarithm of the Error on the Electron Densities
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Primary Parameter Decimal Logarithm of the Error on the Electron Densities
Parameter.Caveats: The Logaritm is applied on the scaled valued. Scale : 1.e^-3

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Electron Temperature
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Primary Parameter Electron Temperature

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Ion Temperature
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Primary Parameter Ion Temperature

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Ion Temperature Error
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Primary Parameter Ion Temperature Error

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Molecular Ion Concentration relative to Ne
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Additional Parameter Molecular Ion Concentration relative to Ne

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Molecular Ion Concentration relative to Ne - Error
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Additional Parameter Molecular Ion Concentration relative to Ne - Error

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar O+ Ion Concentration relative to Ne
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Additional Parameter O+ Ion Concentration relative to Ne

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar O+ Ion Concentration relative to Ne - Error
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Additional Parameter O+ Ion Concentration relative to Ne - Error

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar H+ Ion Concentration relative to Ne
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Additional Parameter H+ Ion Concentration relative to Ne

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar H+ Ion Concentration relative to Ne - Error
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Additional Parameter H+ Ion Concentration relative to Ne - Error

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Decimal Logarithm of the Ion-Neutral Collision Frequency
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Additional Parameter Decimal Logarithm of the Ion-Neutral Collision Frequency
Parameter.Caveats: The Logaritm is applied on the scaled value

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Decimal Logarithm of the Error on the Ion-Neutral Collision Frequency
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP6 ACF Tromso VHF Radar Additional Parameter Decimal Logarithm of the Error on the Ion-Neutral Collision Frequency
Parameter.Caveats: The Logaritm is applied on the scaled value
